name: Master Reversi
overview: Master Reversi is a an Othello game for one or two players. Played on an 8 x 8 board, each player takes turns placing one of two colored pieces on the board. The player gains any pieces on the board their opponent has between their two pieces when played. The player with the most pieces at the end of the game is the victor. The player can compete against 6 different named computer opponents, some of whom will occasionally cheat. The computer opponents can also compete against each other.
